# Progress Ring

```html preview
<div style="display: flex; justify-content: space-between; flex-wrap: wrap;">
  <sl-progress-ring percentage="25">25%</sl-progress-ring><br>
  <sl-progress-ring percentage="50">50%</sl-progress-ring><br>
  <sl-progress-ring percentage="75">75%</sl-progress-ring><br>
  <sl-progress-ring percentage="100">100%</sl-progress-ring>
</div>
```

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property      | Attribute      | Description                                      | Type     | Default     |
| ------------- | -------------- | ------------------------------------------------ | -------- | ----------- |
| `percentage`  | `percentage`   | The current progress percentage, 0 - 100.        | `number` | `undefined` |
| `size`        | `size`         | The size of the progress ring.                   | `number` | `128`       |
| `strokeWidth` | `stroke-width` | The stroke width of the progress ring in pixels. | `number` | `6`         |
